hadiths.text: Ibn Umar (Allah be pleased with them) reported:We used to buy foodgrains during the lifetime of Allah's Messenger (ﷺ). He (the Holy Prophet) would then send to us one who commanded us to take them (the foodgrains) to a place other than the one where we had bought them before we sold it

chapter.ara-name: باب بُطْلاَنِ بَيْعِ الْمَبِيعِ قَبْلَ الْقَبْضِ
chapter.eng-name: It is invalid to sell goods before taking possession of them
